quests.name: Cross-breeding
quests.description: You've been selected for a grant program in the USA to cross-breed corn. Maybe something could come of this?
quests.success: Success! Your new corn has 10% lower water usage.
quests.failure: What a waste! Your corn breed used 10% less water, but it lost its glyphosate resistance. In your shame, you loaded it all up in a biomass reactor and destroyed the evidence.
